thread.title_full: Neil Nitin Mukesh-Rukmini Sahay wedding: These photos from sangeet, mehendi ceremony are too good to miss : Celebrities, News - India Today

title: Neil Nitin Mukesh-Rukmini Sahay wedding: These photos from sangeet, mehendi ceremony are too good to miss : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
The lovebirds looked stunning in traditional attires as they made their way to the mehendi function with the Mewari mela theme. 
Rukmini looked pretty in a light green lehenga, while Neil chose for an orange kurta pyjama. 
The mehendi ceremony was followed by sangeet which saw Neil and Rukmini performing to a song. In an interview to Times of India, Neil had revealed that the two will do an impromotu dance at their sangeet. 
"Both of us decided to not have a choreographed performance. Everyone should see how naturally we gel together," he told the daily. 
Reportedly, Rukmini danced to Laung Gavacha by Nuclea and Piya Tose at her sangeet. A photo posted by WedMeGood.com (@wedmegood) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:37am PST 
Neil and Rukmini are set to tie the knot today. To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
